thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 6 of 39
thread.title: Ger

author: Ger
title: Ger
text: I changed over to energia almost a year ago. My main contact with energia is by phone and online. Both I find excellent service. No problem getting through via phone and very pleasant helpful staff. The online service I find is invaluable as I find it so easy to check up on previous bills etc, input my meter reading and especially pay small lump sums throughput the two months so I don't end up owing a large bill when its due. They make that process so simple, esp after the first time as you dont have to re-enter all your details time and time again. I only wish the motor tax office would take heed!!!!
